findings.message:
CrypviserICO (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#5-98) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- owners.push(_owners[i]) (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#24)
findings.name: controlled-array-length

findings.message:
CrypviserICO._removeOperation(bytes32) (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#77-85) deletes CrypviserICO.PendingOperation (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#6-9) which contains a mapping:
	-delete pending[_operation] (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#84)
findings.name: mapping-deletion

findings.message: Modifier CrypviserICO.onlymanyowners(bytes32) (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#48-52) does not always execute _; or revert
findings.name: incorrect-modifier

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected onlymanyowners(sha3()(msg.data)) (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#87):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected THROW (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#56):
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message:
Deprecated standard detected THROW (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#43):
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
findings.name: deprecated-standards

findings.message: solc-0.4.11 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Version constraint 0.4.11 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector
	- DelegateCallReturnValue
	- ECRecoverMalformedInput
	- SkipEmptyStringLiteral.
It is used by:
	- 0.4.11 (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: Parameter CrypviserICO.send(address,uint256)._value (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message: Parameter CrypviserICO.send(address,uint256)._to (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention

findings.message: Loop condition i < owners.length (0x0ccb03cb1a89808209eaebbcb059ed05e44cb9cf.sol#79) should use cached array length instead of referencing `length` member of the storage array.
findings.name: cache-array-length
